\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: Xenko 1.5 release notes
Notas de versão do Xenko 1.5
Xenko 1.5 release notes
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Highlights
Destaques
Highlights
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Skeleton asset
Asset de esqueleto
Skeleton asset
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
A new Skeleton asset (*.xkskel) has been introduced.
Foi introduzido um novo activo Skeleton (*.xkskel).
A new Skeleton asset (*.xkskel) has been introduced.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Both models and animations now hold a reference to a skeleton.
Ambos os modelos e animações agora têm uma referência a um esqueleto.
Both models and animations now hold a reference to a skeleton.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
This allows to reuse the same skeleton definition in multiple assets and to retarget models and animations to different skeletons.
Isso permite reutilizar a mesma definição de esqueleto em vários ativos e retardar modelos e animações para diferentes esqueletos.
This allows to reuse the same skeleton definition in multiple assets and to retarget models and animations to different skeletons.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Skeletons can be created alongside other assets, when importing an FBX file or other model format.
Esqueletos podem ser criados ao lado de outros ativos, ao importar um arquivo FBX ou outro formato de modelo.
Skeletons can be created alongside other assets, when importing an FBX file or other model format.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Root motion support for models, cameras, lights, etc.
Suporte de movimento de raiz para modelos, câmeras, luzes, etc.
Root motion support for models, cameras, lights, etc.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Animations now apply root motion if they have no skeleton, or the ‘Root Motion’ property is enabled on the animation asset.
As animações agora aplicam o movimento raiz se não tiverem esqueleto, ou a propriedade ‘Root Motion’ está ativada no ativo de animação.
Animations now apply root motion if they have no skeleton, or the ‘Root Motion’ property is enabled on the animation asset.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The animation will then move the entity itself, instead of the skeleton's root bone.
A animação irá então mover a própria entidade, em vez do osso raiz do esqueleto.
The animation will then move the entity itself, instead of the skeleton's root bone.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
This is especially useful to import animations of lights, cameras or unskinned models, without the need to bind them to the bones of a skeleton.
Isso é especialmente útil para importar animações de luzes, câmeras ou modelos sem pele, sem a necessidade de acoplá-los aos ossos de um esqueleto.
This is especially useful to import animations of lights, cameras or unskinned models, without the need to bind them to the bones of a skeleton.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The FBX importer will now also import animations of various camera parameters (near-plane, far-plane, field of view) and apply them to the CameraComponent of the animated entity.
O importador FBX agora também importar animações de vários parâmetros da câmera (near-plane, long-plane, campo de visão) e aplicá-los à CameraComponent da entidade animada.
The FBX importer will now also import animations of various camera parameters (near-plane, far-plane, field of view) and apply them to the CameraComponent of the animated entity.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
More properties may be supported in the future.
Mais propriedades podem ser suportadas no futuro.
More properties may be supported in the future.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
New animation update system
Novo sistema de atualização de animação
New animation update system
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The animation system now internally uses a new UpdateEngine to update objects.
O sistema de animação agora internamente usa um novo UpdateEngine para atualizar objetos.
The animation system now internally uses a new UpdateEngine to update objects.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
This allows us to animate arbitrary properties of entities, while accessing them in a highly efficient way.
Isso nos permite animar propriedades arbitrárias de entidades, ao acessá-las de forma altamente eficiente.
This allows us to animate arbitrary properties of entities, while accessing them in a highly efficient way.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
It will be the foundation for a future animation curve editor inside the GameStudio.
Será a base para um futuro editor de curva de animação dentro do GameStudio.
It will be the foundation for a future animation curve editor inside the GameStudio.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The new ‘Animated Properties’ sample demonstrates how to create animations of any property from a script.
A nova amostra ‘Animated Properties’ demonstra como criar animações de qualquer propriedade a partir de um script.
The new ‘Animated Properties’ sample demonstrates how to create animations of any property from a script.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Simple Profiling system
Sistema de perfis simples
Simple Profiling system
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
It is now possible to visualize profiling information of all the game systems and custom profilers directly within your running games.
Agora é possível visualizar informações de perfil de todos os sistemas de jogo e perfis personalizados diretamente dentro de seus jogos em execução.
It is now possible to visualize profiling information of all the game systems and custom profilers directly within your running games.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
To get started, use the Game Profiler built-in script, attach it to an entity and when the game is running press LCtrl-LShift-P.
Para começar, use o script integrado do Game Profiler, anexá-lo a uma entidade e quando o jogo estiver executando a imprensa LCtrl-LShift-P.
To get started, use the Game Profiler built-in script, attach it to an entity and when the game is running press LCtrl-LShift-P.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Physic debug shapes at runtime
Formas de depuração física no tempo de execução
Physic debug shapes at runtime
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
It is now possible to enable the rendering of physics collider shapes during runtime.
Agora é possível permitir a renderização de formas de colisão de física durante o tempo de execução.
It is now possible to enable the rendering of physics collider shapes during runtime.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The debug shapes are normal entities and they must be enabled for each physics shape that requires it.
As formas de depuração são entidades normais e devem ser habilitadas para cada forma física que o requer.
The debug shapes are normal entities and they must be enabled for each physics shape that requires it.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md

The best way to start with this feature is to use the Physics Shapes Render built-in script and attach the script to any entity that has a Physics Component and when the game is running press LCtrl-LShift-P.

A melhor maneira de começar com esse recurso é usar o script embutido do Physics Shapes Render e anexar o script a qualquer entidade que tenha um Componente de Física e quando o jogo estiver executando a imprensa LCtrl-LShift-P.

The best way to start with this feature is to use the Physics Shapes Render built-in script and attach the script to any entity that has a Physics Component and when the game is running press LCtrl-LShift-P.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Asset View
Visualização de ativos
Asset View
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The Asset view has been improved to help you better organize and manage your assets.
A visualização de ativos foi melhorada para ajudá-lo a organizar e gerenciar seus ativos.
The Asset view has been improved to help you better organize and manage your assets.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
New ‘view options’ menu
Novo menu ‘ver opções’
New ‘view options’ menu
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The view options are gathered in a single menu accessible from the asset view toolbar.
As opções de visualização são reunidas em um único menu acessível a partir da barra de ferramentas de visualização de ativos.
The view options are gathered in a single menu accessible from the asset view toolbar.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
You can display all the assets in the current folder only, in the current folder and its sub-folder.
Você pode exibir todos os ativos na pasta atual apenas, na pasta atual e sua subpasta.
You can display all the assets in the current folder only, in the current folder and its sub-folder.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
The third option let you display the assets and the sub folders.
A terceira opção permite exibir os ativos e as sub pastas.
The third option let you display the assets and the sub folders.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
You can also sort your assets by name, order, type or modification date.
Você também pode classificar seus ativos por nome, ordem, tipo ou data de modificação.
You can also sort your assets by name, order, type or modification date.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
New asset filter bar
Nova barra de filtro de ativos
New asset filter bar
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
With the new asset filter bar, you can filter your assets by name, tag, type or a combination of those.
Com a nova barra de filtro de ativos, você pode filtrar seus ativos por nome, tag, tipo ou uma combinação desses.
With the new asset filter bar, you can filter your assets by name, tag, type or a combination of those.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Each ‘filter tag’ can be disabled by a single click or removed from the active filters.
Cada ‘filtro tag’ pode ser desativado por um único clique ou removido dos filtros ativos.
Each ‘filter tag’ can be disabled by a single click or removed from the active filters.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
To add a filter, type in the filter bar and matching filters will be displayed.
Para adicionar um filtro, digite na barra de filtro e os filtros de correspondência serão exibidos.
To add a filter, type in the filter bar and matching filters will be displayed.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Click on the one you want to add it to the list of active filters.
Clique no que deseja adicioná-lo à lista de filtros ativos.
Click on the one you want to add it to the list of active filters.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Only the assets matching the active filters will be displayed in the asset view.
Apenas os ativos correspondentes aos filtros ativos serão exibidos na visualização de ativos.
Only the assets matching the active filters will be displayed in the asset view.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Note that type filters are inclusive, while name and tag filters are exclusive.
Note que os filtros de tipo são inclusivos, enquanto os filtros de nome e etiqueta são exclusivos.
Note that type filters are inclusive, while name and tag filters are exclusive.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Folder support in asset view
Suporte de pasta na visualização de ativos
Folder support in asset view
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
If the ‘Assets and folder in selected folder’ options is selected, the first level of sub-folder will be displayed in the asset view.
Se as opções "Ativos e pasta na pasta selecionada" forem selecionadas, o primeiro nível de subpasta será exibido na visualização de ativos.

Você pode arrastar e soltar ativos dentro deles.

New built-in scripts
Novos scripts embutidos
New built-in scripts
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
We added a few more built-in scripts with this release such as an FPS camera script and First player controller script.
Adicionamos mais alguns scripts integrados com esta versão, como um script de câmera FPS e o script de controlador de primeiro jogador.

To use them, just click on “New Asset”, “Script source code”, select the desired script and attach it to an adequate entity.

Precompiled Sprite Fonts
Fontes Sprite pré-compiladas
Precompiled Sprite Fonts
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Font rights are quite restrictive and it is quite common that only some persons of the project have access to the font files.
Os direitos da fonte são bastante restritivos e é bastante comum que apenas algumas pessoas do projeto tenham acesso aos arquivos de fonte.
Font rights are quite restrictive and it is quite common that only some persons of the project have access to the font files.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
This was preventing some people to build the game.
Isso estava impedindo que algumas pessoas construíssem o jogo.
This was preventing some people to build the game.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
To solve this problem, we created a new type of asset, the precompiled sprite fonts.
Para resolver este problema, criamos um novo tipo de ativo, as fontes sprite pré-compiladas.
To solve this problem, we created a new type of asset, the precompiled sprite fonts.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
It is an asset taking as input an image and containing all the glyph information required to render the set of character specified.
É um ativo tomando como entrada uma imagem e contendo todas as informações do glifo necessárias para renderizar o conjunto de caracteres especificado.
It is an asset taking as input an image and containing all the glyph information required to render the set of character specified.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
Inside your games you can used it exactly like a standard sprite font.
Dentro de seus jogos você pode usá-lo exatamente como uma fonte sprite padrão.
Inside your games you can used it exactly like a standard sprite font.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes-1.5.md
To generate a precompiled sprite font, the owner of the original font file just have to right click on an existing static font and choose “Generate Precompiled Font”.
Para gerar uma fonte sprite pré-compilada, o proprietário do arquivo de fonte original só tem que clicar com o botão direito em uma fonte estática existente e escolher “Generate Precompiled Font”.
To generate a precompiled sprite font, the owner of the original font file just have to right click on an existing static font and choose “Generate Precompiled Font”.
